content.html: Okay so I’m doing some planning and about to create several JIRA tickets. Where’s the line between doing too much pre-work research on my part vs leaving too many unknowns? I want to smoothen the edges for the team but maybe keep some fun challenge. Any tips?
content.value:
Okay so I’m doing some planning and about to create several JIRA tickets. 

Where’s the line between doing too much pre-work research on my part vs leaving too many unknowns? I want to smoothen the edges for the team but maybe keep some fun challenge. Any tips?
